original_text: And said, By myself have I sworn, saith the Lord, for because thou hast done this thing, and hast not withheld thy son, thine only son:
korean_text: 이르시되 여호와께서 이르시기를 내가 나를 가리켜 맹세하노니 네가 이같이 행하여 네 아들 네 독자도 아끼지 아니하였은즉

sentences.original_text: And said, By myself have I sworn
for because thou hast done this thing
and hast not withheld thy son
